This is the code and I want it changed to p.rights 2

else if(cmd[0].equals("item")) { if(cmd.length == 2 || cmd.length == 3) { int item = Integer.valueOf(cmd[1]); int amount = 1; if(cmd.length == 3) { amount = Integer.valueOf(cmd[2]); } player.getInventory().addItem(item, amount); } else { player.getActionSender().sendMessage("Syntax is: ::item <item> [amount=1].");
